tasks.task_description: Analyze current Agentard color scheme and design system
Define color themes for each Tard: Terrortard, BrainlessTardener, Refactortard, Bullshitard, Delusitard, Pathetictard, Horrortard
Create dynamic routing structure for multi-Tard support
Update CSS variables and theme system for multiple color schemes
Update navigation to support Tard selection
Create content structure for each Tard

description: Create sibling interfaces for each Tard with different themed colors in the Next.js project
context: Analyzed current Agentard color scheme: Uses green terminal theme (#00ff00) with dark background (#0a0a0a), amber accents (#ffb000), cyan highlights (#00ffff), and other terminal colors. System uses CSS custom properties for theming.

Created theme definitions for all 8 Tards with distinct color schemes: Terrortard (red), BrainlessTardener (brown/earth), Refactortard (blue), Bullshitard (gold), Delusitard (magenta/purple), Pathetictard (gray), Horrortard (dark red/black)

Created dynamic routing structure with [tard] layout, individual Tard pages, section pages (chronicles, university, manifesto, core), ThemeProvider component, TardSelector component, and updated homepage to showcase all Tards
Successfully tested the multi-Tard interface system. Development server started without errors on localhost:3000. All Tard routes and theming system are working correctly.
